summary: This is the last follower release for a while, I\'m going to make a few of them and package them together after this.  So expect my next release to have about 8 or so combined into one file.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.minus.com/ib1xNOneK9BBjH.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][FONT=Edwardian Script ITC][size=30][B][color=Chocolate][u]Alexandra\'s friends can be found below.[/color][/B][/size][/FONT][/u]
[size=4][color=Chocolate]
BreeLynn - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139[/url]
Dometria - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161[/url]
Fayleen - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174[/url]
Jazmin - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248[/url]
Arianna - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145[/url]
Rebecca - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24293]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24293[/url]
[/size][/color][/center]
[FONT=Times New Roman][size=4][B][color=grey]
Versions: This is the only version of her.[/color]

[color=red][u]REQUIRED MOD:[/color][color=grey][/u] The only Required mod is Apachii Sky Hair
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - Under Optional Downloads - ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 - A deep thanks for Apachii\'s work!! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Link[/url][/color]

[color=red][u]ADDITIONAL MODS THAT ARE NOT REQUIRED:[/color][/u]

[color=red][u]ARMOR:[/color][color=grey][/u]  The beautiful dress is provided by SydneyB
Ashara Romantic Outfit for CBBE - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5577] Link [/url][/color]

[color=red][u]JEWELRY: [/color][color=grey][/u] The jewelry she is wearing is also by SydneyB
Ashara Dimonized Dress and Dragon jewelry - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146]Link[/url][/color]
[/B]

[color=Firebrick]THANKS: \"Thank you for all those modders out there for making this game that much more enjoyable.\"

SPECIAL THANKS: I learned how to do this from a fellow modder named BravoOskar. He graciously took the time to put up a tutorial, so that some of us could try to do something like this. [/color]

[color=Burlywood]
QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT ASK:
Q. I downloaded Alexandra and she doesn\'t look like your pictures.
A. I am using several mods that make characters in game look better. 
[/size]

[/color][color=Turquoise][center][size=5]
Recommended character texture mods:
[/size][size=4]
1. Better Females by BellaGail - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Link[/url]
2. Covereyes by Mr Lenski - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Link[/url]
3. Coverwomen by Mr Lenski - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Link[/url]
4. Calientes Female Body Mod by Caliente - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Link[/url]
[/color][/size][/FONT][/center]
author: Sharky Borror
